channel.title: I moved my portals, now they don't work
channel.description: I moved my portals, now they don't work. Any ideas?

item.title: I moved my portals, now they don't work
item.dc:creator: @Infineon Infineon
item.description:
@Infineon wrote:

That kinda has nothing to do with whats happening to him, if your source uses cases, then i have no idea how to help you, but if it uses if then statements this is how you do it, first find your portal’s object id, then in your client.java, search objectID == portalID, you should find a if then statement like if(objectID == #### && objectX == #### && objectY == ####){ change the object X and Y to the coordinates where you moved the portal to, then compile and run.

Read full topic
item.source: I moved my portals, now they don't work

item.title: I moved my portals, now they don't work
item.dc:creator: @xX_Energy_xX xX_Energy_xX
item.description:
@xX_Energy_xX wrote:

here, ill give u mine, just edit off it:

code for global object:
makeGlobalObject(3248, 9576, 2474, 0, 10);

Case:
case 2474:
toX = 3113;
toY = 3705;
sM(“You teleport to the pk zone”);
break;

  1. search “makeglobal”, add the code for global object there and edit it.
  2. search “case” keep going until u find stuff with wc mining ect. place it inbetween wc and mining, dont forget the break (hit enter 1 more time)

Read full topic
